name: Next.js S3 Multipart Init Route
description: Create multipart upload and return uploadId (init step).

files.template:
import { S3Client, CreateMultipartUploadCommand } from '@aws-sdk/client-s3';
export async function POST(){ const s3 = new S3Client({}); const out = await s3.send(new CreateMultipartUploadCommand({ Bucket: process.env.S3_BUCKET!, Key: 'big.bin' })); return Response.json({ uploadId: out.UploadId }); }
